1.SceneDescription:
Monica and Chandler's, Monica is trying on a pair of new boots as Chandler
enters.

lines.Line: Hey! So what do you think

New haircut? (Monica nods ‘No.’) Necklace? (No) Dress? (No)
Boots? (Monica nods ‘Yes.’) Boots

Yes! Now, they’re a little more than I normally spend on
boots…or rent (Shows him the receipt.
I’m gonna miss being able to afford food

I’m sorry, they just, they just look so good! And the saleswoman
was looking at me like, "Oh, these are way too expensive for you.
She had a point. (Shows her the receipt.)
She had a point. (Shows her the receipt.)
Oh my God! (Notices the boots) Oh Monica! Those boots are amazing
Yeah well, too bad we’re gonna have to return them
Return them?! Shh! They’re gonna hear you
Return them?! Shh! They’re gonna hear you

Honey, I’m not returning them. Okay? I mean I-I know they cost a
lot, but I’m going to wear them all the time. You’ll see. Besides, I love the
compliments. I mean, have you ever had something so beautiful everyone wanted it
Nice try; I’m keeping the boots

2.SceneDescription:
Central Perk, the next day Rachel, Phoebe, and Chandler are there as Monica
enters.

lines.Line: Hey. (Sits down on the arm of the couch.

See Chandler? I’m getting a lot of use out of them already!
They’re very practical. See, you can wear them with dresses, with skirts, with
pants

You can wear them with shorts on a street corner and earn the money to
pay for them. (Goes and gets some coffee at the counter.
The guy who made these hates feet and wants to see them die
Well-well you can give them to me! I haven’t felt my feet in years

I can’t! I spent so much money on them and I told Chandler that
I’d wear them all the time, I just can’t give them away
Well then get your money back and return them
Well then get your money back and return them

I can’t do that either! The soles’ are already a little
scuffed up and the insides are filled with my blood
Hey I uh just picked up Ben from school
Hey I uh just picked up Ben from school

(spinning around looking for him) I don’t think you did a very
thorough job

I dropped him off at Carol’s. (To Phoebe) Anyway, it turns out that
I’m not going to be able to get those tickets though
Well it turns out that Ben and Sting’s son do not get along

Apparently, Sting’s son made fun of the fact that Ben’s moms are
lesbinims

Wait! But Ross if they don’t get along then you should
smooth things over. Make them be friends
Phoebe, you can’t force kids to be friends
Phoebe, you can’t force kids to be friends
Sure you can! Give them some blocks, put them in a playpen

Your kid is seven?! (Ross nods, "Yes.") (To the rest)
He’s really small. (To Ross) Please! Please get the tickets
Look I’m sorry Pheebs, I can’t do it
Look I’m sorry Pheebs, I can’t do it
Yes you can! Sting says so himself
Look Phoebe, I’m sorry it’s just
Look Phoebe, I’m sorry it’s just
(singing) Rosss can! Give me the tickets! Ross can give me the tickets!

3.SceneDescription:
The Hallway, Monica is returning, but before she enters the apartment she stops
on the step and changes from wearing tennis shoes to the boots and she moans in pain as
she puts each boot on.

lines.Line:
Oh nothing I’m just—just was yawning. (Mimics the groan from
before and stretches.

Oh don’t forget, my office holiday party is tonight. (They go
into the apartment.
Honey, we don’t really have to go to this thing tonight do we
Honey, we don’t really have to go to this thing tonight do we

Now sweetie, I know you don’t like my office parties, but you can
wear your new boots. See? Every cloud has a…supple leather lining

I-I don’t-I don’t think that I’m gonna wear the boots
tonight

Well y’know, I’m just-I’m just worried that bosses will
see them and think they pay you too much money. Or! Or your assistant will see them
and-and want a raise
Do you think I work at some kind of boot pricing company

Anyway, I picked up this outfit that I want to wear and the, and the
boots don’t really go with it

You said that you paid all that money because those boots go with
skirts, dresses, and pants

Fine! If you want me to wear the boots, I’ll wear the boots. In
fact, I’ll go into my room right now and y’know try the outfit on

Okay? (She starts to walk which causes her to start crying) Ooo wee!
Christmas party in my boots! (Runs into the bedroom and mixes saying ‘ow’ with
laughing.

4.SceneDescription:
The Midfield Day School, it’s after school and Ben is taking a drink of
water as Phoebe enters.

lines.Line: Aunt Phoebe, what are you doing here

Well, I heard you’re having a problem with one of the boys in your
class. And so I thought I would just come down here and sit you both down, have a little
talk and make it all okay. Now umm, the boy’s name is Sting’s son
Jack? I hate him! He’s a jerk
Jack? I hate him! He’s a jerk

Now Ben, sometimes people may seem like jerks on the outside, but they
have famous fathers

I have to go. My friend Doug is waiting for me over there. (Goes over to
Doug.

Him you’re friends with. (Starts looking at the children trying to
find Jack and a teacher notices her.
Excuse me. Can, can I help you with something
Excuse me. Can, can I help you with something
Yes! Yes you can, I’m looking for Jack’s parents
Yes! Yes you can, I’m looking for Jack’s parents
Are you with one of the students
Are you one of Ben’s mothers
Are you one of Ben’s mothers

I am one of Ben’s mothers. I’m a lesbian. It was, it was
difficult coming out to my parents
Well hi, I’m Jenny Boone. I’m the new teacher here
I’ve only met your partner Carol
Ah! Okay so that would make me Susan
Ah! Okay so that would make me Susan

Right. Are you looking for Jack’s parents to discuss the
problems he’s having with Ben? (Phoebe nods ‘Yes.’) Yeah. Because I really
do think the parents should sit down and have a conversation

Yeah! Let’s do that!! That-that sounds good. We should sit down and
talk, just me, my lover Carol, and the Stings. Umm, how-how will I get in touch with them
Oh, their number is on the contact sheet
Oh, their number is on the contact sheet

Uh-huh. Uh-huh. Umm, could-could I get a copy of that? ‘Cause Carol
threw it out, she lost ours. She’s such a scatterbrain, but man what a hot piece of
ass

5.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, Dina and Rachel are reading pregnancy books, Dina Pregnancy for Dummies and Rachel something else.

lines.Line:
Do you ever worry that you’ll be walking and your baby will just like
slip out
Hi Dina. Good to see you

Just what needs to be done! Dearly beloved, we are gathered here to join
this man and this woman

Don’t interrupt me when I’m talkin’ to God! Now where were
we? Oh right, okay. Do you Dina, take this man
Hey! You don’t get a say in this

Ahhh! I heard "I do", we’re halfway there! Okay! (To Bobby)
You

All right Joey! That is enough! (Grabs him and pulls him away from Bobby
and Dina) Listen, as beautiful and moving as this ceremony is, it’s not legal. Okay?
They-they don’t have a marriage license, they don’t have any witnesses, and the
groom only has on one shoe
Yeah, he took the other one off and hit me with it
Yeah, he took the other one off and hit me with it
Well what am I supposed to do

You’re supposed to realize that they are adults! And that they can
make their own decisions
No they can’t! They were stupid enough to get knocked up

Heyyyyy! Contraceptives are not always effective! (To Bobby and Dina)
Right
Oh, come on kids! A little help here
Oh, come on kids! A little help here

6.SceneDescription: The Street, Chandler is carrying Monica past a store window.

lines.Line: Okay, ten blocks down. Five to go
(notices something in the window) Oh wait! Stop! Stop! Stop
Oh I’m sorry! Do you need a break
Oh I’m sorry! Do you need a break

My boots in tan! Hey! Can you get a little closer so I can see the
price
I can see it from right here. It’ll cost you one husband

Okay, I’m sorry. I think I can walk the rest of the way now.
Just-just give me my boots
Well I don’t have them either. Where are they
Well I don’t have them either. Where are they

Well, why don’t you check in one of my saddlebags while I chew on
a bale of hay
Okay. (She gets off him.) God well, we gotta go back and get them
Honey, are you seriously ever gonna wear the boots again

Okay, I’m never gonna wear them again. I just didn’t get a
chance to say goodbye
Y’know what? You can say goodbye to the tan ones
Y’know what? You can say goodbye to the tan ones
Okay. (Climbs back on his back.) All right
Okay. (Climbs back on his back.) All right
(to the boots) Bye boots—Wait! Half off?! (Chandler runs off.

7.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Phoebe and Ross are there.

lines.Line: You’re gonna love me so much. I got Sting tickets!! (Holds up two.
Oh my God! I do love you! How did you do it?

Okay, now would you say that that’s more than 50 yards away from
Sting, his wife, or a member of his family
Then that’s not breaking the law! I’m there
